title: Advertisement, "Restaurant Florent:  silverware", late 1980s
dimensions: 13.4 x 13.4 cm (5 1/4 x 5 1/4 in.)  (actual advertisement on torn page)
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: An image of seven pieces of silver flatware in an ornate pattern, in a horizontal arrangement, one piece per line, is depicted on a black backgrond. In the space between the soupspoon and knife, that is, the third and fourth lines, cheers from florent is imprinted in small, lowercase, white type. M&Co is imprinted on the knife blade just above the handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Restaurant Florent:  silverware", late 1980s.
late 1980s. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-316.
